items.sentence: If you can't explain something simply, you don't understand it well.
My happiness is overshadowed by the thought that Tom is not with us.
Tom got out of bed, got dressed, and then went out to milk the cows.
Doing something with a friend is more fun than doing it by yourself.
Tom got angry when I pointed out that his behavior was unacceptable.
It doesn't matter how talented you are, we're not going to hire you.
I've been using homemade laundry detergent for the past three years.
The police suspect that Tom killed his wife for the insurance money.
You just have to know it works. You don't need to know how it works.
You didn't know that I was still planning to join the team, did you?
